response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your growth. This product has been meticulously designed to meet the unique needs of companies like yours, offering unparalleled efficiency and cost savings. Given its exceptional capabilities and the value it brings, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, helping you achieve your business objectives more effectively. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
